replies.author: Aryn
replies.text: Well Seth Jesus said those without sin cast the first stone!! Seth are you trying to tell us that you weren't out with your friends and said some things when you had some drink?? Called girls night out or bachelorette party!! Thank God no one was recording it huh?? These women that Trump supposedly did things are heresy and would not stand up in court of law!! Doesn't it activate your brain that they waited till last debate before voting to bring these democrat paid bimbos out?? When the evil media is owned by the democrats and can say anything and people with less then 2 brain cells will believe it!! We do know that Bill is a sexual Predator and abuses women !! We do know that Hilary got off a evil pedophile off on sexually torturing a 12 year old and that wasn't the worst of it, she then laughed about it on a recording!! When the child was in a coma for 5 days!! That is demon evil!! These are the facts and they cannot be disputed. Trump situation is all heresy!! Use your brain Seth!!
